sentences.sContent: Swim off the side of the ship and snorkel in some of the clearest waters imaginable.
sentences.sCn: 游离小船边，用呼吸管潜游到可以想像得到的一些最清澈的水域。

words.tran: 用水下通气管潜航；用通气管潜泳（snorkel的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: When someone snorkels, they swim under water using a snorkel.
A snorkel is a tube through which a person swimming just under the surface of the sea can breathe.
